attributes.additional_details:
To Whom It May Concern:

My claim is about not giving support and visa extensions to educated & well qualified foreign nationals/individuals but keeping all support & long stay visas to foreign criminals or assylum seekers.

You should know the difference between them and should provide the visa extensions to those individuals who are willing to work harder for country and willing to pay you more taxes rather living in country on your taxes.

Specially those students/professionals who enter into UK for higher education and spend their potential and precious time in your country and paying taxes without any hurdle.

Simply country should know the difference between good or bad.
